intro: Schilleria pilulifera, commonly known as the pill-bearing schilleria, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Acanthaceae family and is characterized by its striking, tubular flowers that range in color from red to purple. The plant typically grows in rocky, well-drained soils and thrives in full sun. Its unique, pill-like seed pods are an important feature for identification. Schilleria pilulifera is valued in horticulture for its ornamental appeal and adaptability to various garden conditions.
